cub general: You can't seem to find a queen to help clean all of this muck off of your fur.
You've found a good bush to hide in while the Dark Forest warriors train around you.
You can't play moss-ball here- the brittle leaves of the Dark Forest just crumble under your paws.
You pretend that the muck on your fur is mud, grasping at memories of times when you were carefree.
It's so cold here. You miss the c_nClan nursery.
